textBeforeTable: Maniaplanet. PCGames.de, each of which offers the same half-dozen new screenshots. Thanks Frans via Jeux Video and a German preview on TrackMania2 Canyon, Nadeo's upcoming racing sequel, in action. There's also a French preview of the game on this trailer showing TrackMania website now redirects to The [Apr 26, 2011, 4:29 pm ET] - Share - Viewing Comments TrackMania2 Trailer, Screenshots --> Blue's News Favorite! textAfterTable: 4. Re: TrackMania2 Trailer, Screenshots Apr 28, 2011, 02:24  Xymph    Shadowcat wrote on Apr 27, 2011, 19:43: Blue: Surely "Canyon" is just the environment being shown, rather than a sub-title for the game? I am assuming that like all the previous TM games (save for the Nations freeware), this one will contain a variety of environments. The games (TM2, ShootMania, QuestMania) will be released one environment at a time, so yes, Canyon is the initial TM2 env. Read up on the ManiaPlanet forums for how all this is planned.
